About Us

Home

    About Us

    Project Vision:

    The goal of this project was to use the Pexels API to display stock images that the user are able to interact with.

    The User will be able to click on the pictures and have the pictures be enlarged.


    Team Member Contributions:

      4. Created the Individual Photos Page and paginated it.
      5. Applied the fixes to get Github Pages working.
